title: Pretty Good
body: Only complaint is I wish I could transfer the workout data to my PC or something.  VITALITY POINTS !!! lol

title: nice
body: Simple and good rate monitor

title: Love the watch
body: Great way to track heart rate and calories burned for a good price

title: haven't used it because I didn't realize I had to ...
body: haven't used it because I didn't realize I had to wear a strap around my chest for it to work

title: Five Stars
body: THIS IS WHAT YOU NEED TO KEEP TRACK OF ALL THOSE CALORIES BURNED!!

title: It does a great job of monitoring my heart rate
body: It does a great job of monitoring my heart rate.  All of the Cardo machines at our Y pick up the heart rate.  I just had a heart valve replaced and this helps me stay with in a safe limit during exercising.

title: Great Basic Heart Rate Monitor Watch
body: I love this heart rate monitor watch.  You can set the minimum heart rate to maximum heart rate and it will tell you if you are below or above the heart rate target.  I also like the fact you can check your current calorie counter while working out.    It is very easy to navigate and I recommend this product.

title: poor, frustrated.
body: When i got my watch i set it up and it is not working. Ive done everything properly and still not workin. Ive also emailed the polar company. Ive had about a month and its not working so i dont know if i got a defective one.

title: Works well.
body: My wife loves this heart rate watch and the calorie count. It makes her workouts more enjoyable as she see's a digital reading of her progress in the form of calories burned. Chest piece fits nice and doesn't impede the workout.

title: Glad I finally bought one!!!
body: Using this daily has helped me to met my exercising goals! The chest strap is super comfortable, I was worried about it not fitting. It was also super easy to use. After nearly 2 weeks I am seeing a difference in the way my clothes fit. Its great to be able to take my exercise routine  beyond the gym (even though those machines are very inaccurate) and switch things up.

title: Dead Batteries
body: My daughter loves this watch, however I was very disappointed that the batteries were DOA Dead-on-Arrival when she opened the package on Christmas Day. That cost me an extra $13.75 from Walgreens. :(

title: Four Stars
body: Working fine!

title: Ft4
body: Works great! Love my device. The watch is easy to set, coordinates with excerxise machines at the gym, and is accurate! The hear rate monitor/band goes undetected and is very comfortable.

title: Love it
body: Completely obsessed with this!! A must have for anyone serious about losing that weight!

title: Easy to use
body: Does exactly what it says it's going to do. Easy to use!

title: Um is it supposed to be new?
body: Got the watch after great shipping however, the box has been opened, the plastic that I know is supposed to cover the face of the watch is gone and the battery is dead dead. I replaced the battery three times and within two weeks the watch would freeze, and then the face would go blank. I could no longer use it after a month of purchasing it and I've never had issues with Polar Watches before.

title: Five Stars
body: Item was perfect! Exactly what I expected! Fab!!

title: Two Stars
body: Not happy but may work for others.

title: Polar FT4
body: It works great! I use it daily during my workouts.

title: Four Stars
body: Description is not very clear but this is a female sized watch band.

title: But I really enjoy its input for my cardio
body: This lovely device allows me to track my calories burned after my cardio workout. There is a slight caveat to this: it only measures cardio. This means if you lift weights, the calorie readings will be off. As another reviewer put it, lifting weights does not cause your heart rate to climb very much so a heart rate monitor will not be able to track calories burned for those types of exercises. But I really enjoy its input for my cardio. Also, I'm one of those lazy people who needs a cool gadget to motivate me to work out and this has done beautifully! Plus, you don't have to look at the watch while your running, the device that you strap to your chest transmit the readings on the same frequency as the treadmill does. Thus, the treadmill picks up the signal and shows you what your heart rate is! It's handy!

title: Great HRM
body: This works great and the band is not at all uncomfortable. I love the heart touch feature, you simply hold the watch to your heart, while wearing the band, and it will show the time. Great HRM at a decent price. I would definitely recommend this to others.

title: Love Polar products
body: Love Polar products.  This is a simple 1 zone HRM.  The HRM transmitter has given me issues since I've purchased it, but after contacting Polar via Email, they sent me a new one.  Great customer service.

title: ... little big as I have small wrists but I like the ease of setup and use
body: Watch is a little big as I have small wrists but I like the ease of setup and use. Helpful in collecting data yo help me reach the next level of fitness.

title: Five Stars
body: Works wonderfully

title: Five Stars
body: Lovvvvveeee! That is all

title: LOVE IT
body: Works great!! i love it, it comes with and strap to check your heart rate and it is easy to set up

title: Five Stars
body: great deal

title: Scratch of the screen
body: I received the item with a scratch on the screen and no protection film. Please process some refund. I can provide picture if needed.

title: Polar heart monitor watch, great buy!
body: This watch worked great right out of the box. Once you enter your info at the set up, you're good to go. On your bday it has a cake pic on the screen all day(I thought that was cute). Works great when working out. Just remember to wet the band before you put it around your chest.

title: Keeping me on track
body: LOVE this device. so simple and so effective on my attitude and motivation. I love the simplicity of it and that i'm not messing around with all kinds of buttons to get the basics of what i needed and want for my health workouts.

title: love it!!
body: Absolutely great heart rate monitor. I love the shape, it never snags on clothing. It's not loud and works without glitches.I'd highly recommend this HRM.

title: Love love looooove
body: This watch is  everything I wanted and more. It's cute and small, and very handy. I used it for the first time today and totally fell in love. I recommend this to anyone trying to lose weight or just trying to keep fit!

title: I am happy with the item
body: The only problem so far, is that sometimes, it loses connection when I am working out and I have to start the monitor over again. For the price, I am happy with the item.

title: Three Stars
body: Gets the job done

title: Four Stars
body: I like this

title: Polar FT4
body: Accurate and easy to use. Stores data so you can review history.  Comfortable band; you forget you're wearing it. Great investment. Witty the money.

title: Five Stars
body: Came quickly & was exactly what I wanted

title: Great investment.
body: I recently started getting into working out. I find it very hard to stay motivated if I can't see results. Because with working out, results are obviously not immediate, I mainly bought this monitor so I could see how many calories I was burning per workout. Seeing the calorie burn count go up has kept me motivated. I am able to see which workouts give me the most burn in the least amount of time. It stores up to 10 workouts so you can go back and see what you have burned. It is very easy to set up and operate. It is comfortable to wear and I honestly have no complaints.

title: Stopped Working - Can't Return?
body: NEW REVIEW: Have only had a few months and has stopped connecting with the heart monitor, making it just an expensive watch now. Amazon says I can NOT return it. So if I was to do it over again, I would probably buy elsewhere with a better return policy for this type of item.OLD REVIEW: Has all of the features I was looking for in a heart rate monitor. Is a quiet beep when you are outside of your selected range. The only thing that could be better is if there was a different sound for being below and above the appropriate range.Works well as it automatically syncs with every treadmill and elliptical I have used it with.

title: New design a plus
body: New design on the chest piece seems to be better. My old one ceased shut and I was unable to change the battery.

title: Just buy it already!
body: I've only had this for about three weeks so far, but I love it! I can't believe I didn't get it sooner. I can't say for longevity, but as far as ease of use and helpfulness throughout a workout it's great! I have the strap as tight as it can go, which is probably about 29-30", any smaller and it might not work properly. If I make it any tighter it will sit on the sensor and that's not supposed to be bent so probably not a good idea. I was afraid of it stretching too much but after washing it seems to bounce right back. No problems or regrets so far!

title: Great monitor
body: Got it as a gift for my husband. He love it. It keeps the calorie count for the workout and will give him his week worth of calories and more. Also very accurate on the heart rate. He just wishes it would record back to his iPhone but its on the watch so he can write it down.

title: Does what it needs to do!
body: Easy set up. Seems to work perfectly fine for what it is suppose to do! I enjoy having it for my workouts!

title: Perfect! I was hesitant to even get one of ...
body: Perfect! I was hesitant to even get one of these due to the cost, but it is totally worth it. Easy to use, motivational, and cute.

title: Well Worth The Investment
body: This heart rate monitor was completely worth the investment! Before I had purchased this I was going off of what the machine said I was burning calorie wise. When I used this I was astonished to know how different the numbers really were. It was a huge difference as in 50-100 calorie difference. The watch beeps at you when you're below the goal heart rate and I find this really helpful. Overall this was the best addition to my workout routine!

title: Five Stars
body: Perfect

title: Just what I needed
body: The only other heart rate monitors I've used were the ones our high school had us use. I couldn't tell you the brand, but that is my only comparison. As far as my needs and what I was looking for, this was perfect and then some. It covered all my needs and needs I didn't even know I had. It keeps your previous information stored so you can review it at your discretion. It is simple to use, works great, and not to mention the colors are awesome. definitely worth it!

title: Works great!
body: Works great! Tried it on my workout this morning. It was easy to set up, and provided me exactly what was described in the product description. The chest strap was comfortable-I didn't really notice it while working out. The screen was easy to read.

title: Good price but one small problem
body: Love the product, but the sensor sent with it didn't work. The description said all accessories had been checked for functionality but again, the sensor did not work properly. I had to contact Polar for a replacement.

title: Worked great 3 times
body: Stopped working on the 4th time I used it, will not detect heart rate. Don't know if it's the transmitter or the receiver, and it doesn't matter much to me which it is, I just know it doesn't work. Disappointing.

title: Five Stars
body: I love it

title: Love it!
body: Great product especially for the price. Very pleased with my purchase! Works great and is easy to use.

title: Good reliable watch for workouts!
body: I go to the gym every week day and love to know how my workout is going so I got the Polar FT4 Heart Rate Monitor.  First of all, I loved the color but it was a bit on the big side.  Trying to program it took some time, but I finally managed to get it all right.  I also had to figure out how to use it at the gym, but after a few button pushes I was able to figure that out also.  The tricky part was keeping it going as sometimes it would just stop showing results.  I tried to moisten the chest strap before using it which would help, but not all of the time.  When it worked, it worked well and would show calories burned, time worked out and heart rates.  During the work out I could keep track of my heart rate and would know if I needed to ramp it up or cut back a bit.  Usually I go to an indoor cycling class and it did a great job of showing me how my work out was going.  It was somewhat hard to replace the battery and sometimes I wasn't sure if the watch or the chest strap battery needed replacing.  Overall, I loved having my workout results on my watch so I knew how I was doing.

title: Five Stars
body: I love my watch!!!

title: Great watch
body: I love my polar watch ! Its perfect it tracks my heart rate and calories perfect while im working out , its a great tool to have when your trying to loose weight or for whatever the reason is

title: Five Stars
body: Love love love my polar FT4!!! Heart rate strap is very comfortable! Works great!!

title: Necessary Item for Fitness Enthusiasts
body: I started going to a dance class where all the ladies were wearing a funny watched that beeped a lot. I finally asked someone what was up with this trend, and they gave me information on the Polar Heart Rate Monitor. Whether you are starting the whole fitness routine or always love hitting the treadmill, this item is for you. I now know exactly where my heart rate is at and how many calories I am burning per session. It is a great watch!

title: Great Watch!
body: I love this watch!  Not only does it monitor your heart rate as you're exercising but it tells you the number of calories burned once you finish.  It seems to be very accurate and I never work out without it.  I love that it saves your training files and that it lights ups.  When not in use it also displays the time.  It has truly been a great investment and a great accessory to my weight loss plan.

title: FT4 Heart Monitor
body: Great product. The instructions lack but the device is great once you figure it all out. I have been using it 3 times a week and have found the information very helpful.

title: LOVE IT!
body: Love this watch. But I wished I would have gotten the H7 to connect to the app. But over all does work great

title: in love
body: I swim laps with this every day.  All I can say is that it works great and I LOVE it.

title: Five Stars
body: Love! Worth every penny!

title: Great heart rate monitor for the price.
body: This heart rate monitor is great. Picks up well, even while swimming. Easy to use. I like that it notifies you when you are out of range. The watch is a little bulky but it makes me look tough :)

title: It doesn't work correctly.
body: I wanted to get this watch to monitor my heart rate and calories burned, but IT DOESN'T WORK!!! I purchased a few months ago and decided to really give it a workout yesterday and it was extremely disappointing. The heart rate monitor will read and then drop to zero, so it doesn't track anything properly and I can't stop a workout to check on it every couple of minutes. It was a total waste of money and I'm disgusted.

title: Awesome watch!!!!!
body: I love my watch its awesome!!! A lot of the time I do forget the strap though but this is a great watch to keep track of how many calories you burn.

title: This thing rocks!
body: I usually avoid unnecessary technology that tends to complicate life. This little gadget allows one to program age, gender, weight, and height and then provides an accurate calorie counter - much more accurate and reliable than exercise machines.I go to the gym and  do aerobics for 80 minutes hopping on and off bikes, treadmills, elliptical machine and rowing machines. All the while this little gadget is recording the calories burned. It is easy to program, easy to set, and easy to read.  It is all I need.

title: Remarkable value
body: This watch is a remarkable value. The strap is very comfortable and stays in place even during my most strenuous elliptical workouts. The watch's display is simple, but contains all  the information I need. I highly recommend this watch.

title: Amazing Service and Product
body: My polar ft4 came quickly and I got to using it right away. It's absolutely amazing! Definitely worth every penny if you're trying to get healthy and fit like myself.I Love it!! Thank you!!

title: Perfect!
body: Other reviewers have already said everything about this wonderful HR monitor. Now that I have been using it awhile, I don't know how I got along without it! I love how I can tell instantly where my heart rate is at during any given workout. This device has helped me tell which workouts I need to do more of and which workouts are no longer challenging. I also love how it syncs with the machines at the gym! Great affordable gadget for anyone who is dedicated to improving themselves through exercise.

title: Five Stars
body: great watch...  just need to use it

title: One Star
body: For some odd reason my heart monitor doesn't work

title: Awesome!!!
body: It's exactly what I needed!!!! I motions your heart rate letting you know when you are in the zone and burning fat! And it came with all the necessary pieces it needed to show me this. I wish I could by so many people this watch!!!

title: FT4
body: I love this! It has really motivated me to work out harder whether im lifting or on the tred. I would recommend.

title: Awkward to use
body: Too many buttons and display is difficult to read. User guide isn't very user friendly. I like the band - it syncs with machines at my gym so I don't have to wear the watch but would like to be able to get workout info when I'm lifting or do core work.

title: Wonderful product!
body: This is by far the most accurate heart rate monitor I have used. I love that it calculates my calories as well. Although I have noticed that it doesn't alway match what the fitness equiptment says I've burn in terms of calories or when monitoring my heart rate. But overall I'm very happy with it. I sometimes have issues with the strap depending on the type of sports bra I wear I have to adjust the band to pick up my heart rate.

title: Comfortable, works great and looks great
body: Exactly what I expected. Comfortable,  works great and looks great. Very accurate.

title: Love!!
body: I LOVE this watch, it gets the job done exactly how I imagined. It is very accurate and helps get the job done!

title: Polar FT4 Heart Rate Monitor
body: The Polar FT4 clock, I feel great ... the device's features are in line with my needs, heart rate and calories made ​​during the time in which I am doing my exercise routine, is comfortable, attractive and can be used daily.

title: Good!
body: Just got my Polar monitor tonight and tried it out. It looks cool and picked the heart rate signal very fast (after I moistened the electrodes). I am a smaller athletic girl and was concerned that either the wrist, or the chest straps will be too big. However, both straps fit perfectly and there is room in both straps either way! Definitely no concerns about the fit, I can see it fitting women from size 00 up to 16. Not sure if it will comfortably fit the plus sized women, that is just something I cannot comment on. But is definitely great for smaller women and is comfortable too. The screen is very simple, but easy to navigate. It doesn't do anything fancy, but I mostly bought it to accurately track my heart rate and the calories burned, and it does that so I am pleased. I am looking out to try it out during my next work out, and I hope that it performs smoothly for a long time from now. P.S. The monitor can be also worn as a wrist watch/alarm outside of working out.

title: GREAT for my needs
body: I didn't want to buy an expensive watch. So this was a perfect solution. They said it would take about almost 2 months... It only took about a week to received which made it THAT much better! Great heart monitor if all you need is something simple.

title: Five Stars
body: Exactly what I needed

title: Five Stars
body: Bought for my sister per her request and she loved it!

title: just what i was looking for.
body: i was tired of "guessing" what I was doing when it came to exercise and calorie counts.  This gives me a sense of complete info.  it's very close to what I was calculating manually so it takes the inconvenice out of having to figure out if my day was sucessful or not.

title: Five Stars
body: great product, does exactly what it says, very acurate.

title: It's easy to start and self explanatory
body: This HRM has met all my expectations. It's easy to start and self explanatory.

title: Love thewatch
body: Love the watch. It has helped me keep count of my calories burned while exercising. I've read some people had had problems replacing the battery but I had none. Maybe they fixed the issue after I bought mine.. it was a while back too. Hope that helps!

title: Excellent Affordable Heart Rate Monitor
body: Excellent heart rate monitor. I have used this during insanity and it is working great. Occasionally the heart strap will disconnect from the watch and requires me to take it off and put it on again but so far so good. Looking forward to using it this spring, summer and fall during runs and bike rides.

title: Best Choice
body: Best heart rate monitor and calories burned watch ever.  I have had several and this so easy to use and accurate.  The chest best is comfortable and you don't even know you have it on.  Love this!!

title: Easier than I thought!
body: I have never owned an HRM before and was worried I wouldn't know how to set it up or use it. I found that it was a breeze to set up and use! Would definitely recommend to anyone.

title: Great Purchase!
body: This watch works great. It tracks how long you workout as well as how many calories you have burned.I would recommend this product.

title: A great heart rate monitor and watch
body: I love this heart rate monitor.  it's cute, accurate, priced great and useful. It's easy to use, very straightforward and durable. I use it as my every day watch too

title: Five Stars
body: LOVE my Polar. Will not workout without it. :)

title: Five Stars
body: As good as advertised.

title: Five Stars
body: excellent monitor

title: Worth Every Penny
body: I got this as a gift from my mother and I absolutely love it. The heart rate monitor fits perfectly and does not move once it is in place. At first it can feel a little weird but after a few minutes you forget it is there. The watch fits perfectly on my wrist which is amazing because I have huge wrists. The band allows for any size wrist. The buttons are very easy to use and remember and it is an extremely simple set up. I imagine with time I will upgrade it but for now it is an amazing starter fitness watch! I highly recommend!!

title: Excellent
body: Amazing

title: The chest trap has to be way too tight to work
body: We bought two of these and only one heart monitor works. I hate how tight it has to be on your chest to register, I feel like it is cutting off my circulation. I would suggest buying the one that goes on your upper arm instead of this one.

title: Five Stars
body: Love, love love this watch!! Use it every time I work out

title: Alarm voice
body: Polar is famous in its accurate heart rate monitoring, the alarm should remind people clearly with it's loud voice volume. dissapointely  the voice of alarm is too small to hear even in a very silent evironment, you can not expect to hear it in runing outside.Any way to tune the volume to louder?

title: ... heart rate while working out and FT4 does a good job at that
body: I needed to keep up with my heart rate while working out and FT4 does a good job at that , it also is on the same frequency as the treadmill at the gym so I get a continuous readout on the equipment a nice extra, can also use the FT4 for a watch when not exercising . So far it works quite well though I don't use all of it's functions I like it. The only negative I had to replace the battery in the transmitter after the second day then no problems, Panasonic batteries are no good.

title: Five Stars
body: yay

title: Five Stars
body: Most excellent

title: Four Stars
body: great simple way to track your heart rate during workout

title: Exactly what I was looking for.
body: I bought this to track my heart rate during cardio workouts and running.  It is exactly what I needed.  Easy to use and user friendly,

title: Just buy it already!
body: I love my Polar FT4. It's very easy to use. It keeps me motivated because I can see how many calories I'm burning. I clean the strap afterwards with sanitized wipes. It's very east to set up. Also, I run the rubber portion under cool water so it adheres to my skin for an accurate reading. I hope this helps.

title: Five Stars
body: Worked great

title: Great
body: Does what this seller said it would do. Glad to go with a less expensive model. Because at the end of the day all you need is your heart rate being given to you from moment to moment. No need for computer log in and all that nonsense

title: Works good
body: Works good for use on treadmill to keep your heart rate in the range you want it in.

title: Easy to use!
body: This HRM is so easy to use. I can't wait to actually try it during a workout. Not to mention, I love the colors!

title: Greate HR and Calorie monitor...
body: This is probably the most accurate and convenient way to see the HR during any kind of exercise(except in water).  I was very impressed by it.  The best way to place the chest strap is right under the ribcage.

title: love it
body: I love it ! its easy to use and its accurate on the amount of calories that are been burned.The fact that it saves your files you can push yourself and see your progress.

title: Gift for my wife
body: I love this heart monitor watch, easy to use when I do a spinning class. Great color and fits my wrist.

title: Five Stars
body: Love it setting it up was a little confusing, but once it was set up everything worked out great!

title: I like my old one better
body: It's ok, it works for time and calories, but I liked my last polar as it could tell me my heart rate along with my time. Those two items were important to me. I'm not going to look to see if I'm "in my range" while I'm exercising. And the watch feels sort of cheap plastic. I suppose it's more waterproof, so that may be the reason. I like that aspect and I like the chest strap better than my last one.

title: LOVE this product
body: This monitor was exactly what I was looking for. The chest strap is great. Both the watch and strap are waterproof, I've been swimming with them several times!!

title: Great
body: This watch/hr monitor combo is great. I researched for around a month before purchasing this watch. All the reviews pointed squarely to this one. I almost bought a $25 dollar model but decided to splurge on this one. It was super simple to set up that I decided to have a short run to try it out.The band slipped a few times but after tightening the band a little that problem wasn't an issue. The calorie burn was pretty average with what I saw with my nike running app. I love the ability to see how hard I am working and push myself more.I would say it is a great purchase.

title: Helpful for weight loss
body: It was packaged perfectly and it is great for someone who wants to know how many calories they've burned in a workout. With this I realized I wasn't burning half as many calories as I thought I was. It has made me push harder and I've lost weight.

title: Five Stars
body: Helpful for my workouts.

title: Very accurate and useful
body: According to both the treadmill and the epileptic machine. Has different screens so that one can see either the time, the calories burned, the current heart rate, or a little bar line with your heart rate measured against the minimum and maximum heart rate zone.

title: Love this watch
body: I bought this watch to use it so I could get an accurate burn for my cardio turbofire workouts. The chest strap is very comfortable and easy to use. The watch is plastic and a little bit bulky for everyday wear. It is waterproof,I wore it in the pool one day and didn't have any issues with it when I was swimming. The one problem I have had with it is that if you do a lot of twisting and turning of your torso(like a turbofire workout does) you tend to lose connection and the monitor does not pick up your heart rate properly. So I make sure to keep an eye on my Heart rate to make sure that it is transmitting properly. Set up is a breeze and the batteries seem to last a long time. I've had mine for 5 months and have used it almost daily and have yet to replace the battery. This is a great watch for the person looking to track heart rate for a true calorie burn total.

title: Pleased with this purchase
body: I am very happy with this HRM as it is easy to read with large display characters, it is not over designed with too many features, and it works every time I use it. The elastic chest strap needs some adjusting until you find the fit that is right. Made quite durable too. For the price it is worth every cent.

title: polar Ft 4
body: Love it. It is great to monitor your heart rate and the calories your burn.

title: Good buy
body: Love it and works really well. Seems pretty accurate to the Nike app when showing calories burnt.

title: Five Stars
body: LOve it

title: Love it!
body: Gotta admit, I truly love this product. Tracking your time as well as calories burned pushes you even harder. Easy to set up, easy to use. No complaints thus far.

title: nice
body: as expected

title: This thing is just great. I love using it on my workouts
body: This thing is just great. I love using it on my workouts. Love seeing my max heart rate decrease as I get fitter ;)

title: Polar FT4 Heart Rate Monitor
body: The watch is wonderful but I absolutely hate the new strap! It's not a deal breaker but luckily I have old straps from my old watch and my husbands watch that are compatible. The new strap is in a drawer. The hook (if you can call it a hook) is miserable and it has slipped off mis-workout several times no matter how tight it was. I like the premise that the battery is removable and the strap is able to be laundered but as stated before the 'clasp' or 'hook' is unacceptable for me. This has no bearing on Amazon but on the manufacturer. I'm curious what others think about the strap.

title: Excelent watch
body: I bought this watch and this product was excelent for my wife, I recomend this watch for practice sports. I am happy

title: Does not work if you have a pacemaker.
body: The signal from the monitor seems to cause the pacemaker to pace at full amount whether needed or not.  I could not get a consistent reading.  If  you do not have a pacemaker it should be ok.  The numbers on the display are not very big.  Other than that it is ok for the money.

title: Do not recommend!
body: Cheap and broke after a couple uses.

title: Best decision I made for my workouts!
body: Very accurate, I love that the heart rate monitor strap is thin and not noticeable. Easy to set up and get going!

title: I do have a heart
body: The unit I received would not display a heartbeat even though I am sure that I do have a beating heart. I soaked the chest band in water, without effect. I suppose the problem was a bad battery in the band, but I felt that the seller should and could have tested the unit before shipping. I returned the item.

title: Highly recommend! Easy to use & works great
body: Highly recommend!  Easy to use & works great :)

title: FREAKING LOVE THIS WATCH
body: FREAKING LOVE THIS WATCH. I have never had any sort of fitness watch/step monitor/etc. type health tracker. Ever. The most I have ever done is track my calories in an app. This watch, makes me feel like I am conquering the world every time I am done with a work out. I know I push myself harder to see that calorie count go higher and higher. My first work out with this watch, I burned almost 800 calories. I just couldn't stop. Now I average about 500 calories per work out. Its so nice to see that my weight training is burning so many calories! Go Polar! I love the price! Never ha an issue ever!!!!!

title: Great!
body: This has worked great for me! I just needed it to get a grasp on how many calories I'm actually burning. When I first got it, I was having a problem with it say "Check Heart Transmitter", however, I took the batteries out and put them in again, (without pushing it up in the backing, just laying it in loosely and then putting the back on it.) Since then, I haven't had any problems with it! I wear it usually 4 times a week for different activities. (Zumba, walking, running, softball...)

title: IF YOU DONT LIKE THE FACT THAT IT SHOULD BE SENT TO REPLACE BATTERY THEN TURN IT OFF!!!!
body: I purchased this item and it works fine, it does its job, gives you the basic data that you may need and it is light.I dont have the habit of use a wrist clock, so I use it only while my workouts. Sometimes they are not as often as I would wish. With this said, I dont need the monitor to be ON always, so what I do is turn it off and then turn it on again when I want to use it. I was wondering how it was designed so that manufacturing had the oportunity to turn it off without taking off the battery. And I found it!!!!To do so you must have plenty of fingers and a little bit of patience... The main instruction would be, press all the buttons and wait for some time.But I have found that if you do it in certain order, it is easier to have success. So press the square button, without unpressing the button, press the down button, without unpressing previous buttons, press the circle button, without unpressing the previous buttons press the up button and finnally after pressing the 4 buttons and making sure the 4 buttons are pressed, press the light button and hold it for about 4 seconds. When the monitor has shut down, unhold the buttons and the monitor is turned off.Will you loose data... Yes and no. The data that is from your previous runs, will hold on the internal memory and they wont be erased by the action of turning off the product. BUT the date and time will be lost and also your preferences. Everything in this life has a cost. Your personal settings like your date of birth, weight and height, will not be changed but it has to be loaded. How to explain this... You have to update your weight, date of birth and height but it will appear as if the monitor would already know it...Well, I hope this review help you to turn off your device without a problem and I hope you can enjoy it more.

title: great gift
body: Bought it for my girl friend, she loves it! I had imagined it would be a little bigger but the size is fine. Quick shipment, most importantly it made it here before Christmas!

title: But it functioned just fine for another few years
body: You can't beat the way polar stands behind their products.  I had a monitor before this one.  It was well out of warranty when the battery gave out.  The instructions very clearly said to only allow Polat to change the battery.  So I took it to Batteries RUS and had a new battery put in.  That lasted less that a week.  I sent the monitor to Polar with a full confession of what I had done.  In a very short time I received another monitor from Polar.  It may have been reconditioned I don't know.  But it functioned just fine for another few years.  Even though I told them I had not followed their recommendations and the monitor had been ruined because of that. Polar still replaced the out of warranty monitor free of charge.  I tell everyone that is interested this story.  If I ever want anything and Polar makes one that is what I will buy.  Customer service goes a long way as does word of mouth.  I'm glad I had this opportunity to tell this story to so many people.

title: Love this watch
body: So easy to use and easy to clean. This is exactly what I wanted in a calorie-burning watch, it works so well. I recommend it to any beginners.

title: Great
body: This product works really great. Worth every penny. I recommend this product to whoever wants to be more aware of their calories burned.

title: Four Stars
body: Works as expected and the price was perfect!

title: Polar ft4
body: I've owned several of these watches, but I bought this one solely on the color. Unfortunately after trying for two days to get the sensor to catch my heart rate (yes, I doused in water and had it as tight as it would go) it would not pick up my heart rate for longer than a few seconds. I felt like the sensor was weak, it would only catch my heart rate when I would press it as hard as I could into my chest? My other polar I've had for 5 years (f6) started right away. I liked the old chest strap better than this one, but disappointing that I had to send it back. If you buy this, buy from Amazon. Amazon is the BEST about returns.

title: Awesome watch!
body: Such a great watch - near perfect. Very comfortable as is the chest strap. So much more affordable than that $100+ one. Only wish it came with a pedometer. That would make it absolutely perfect.

title: Easy
body: This heart rate monitor is great. I had originally bought a different brand from somewhere else and hated it after using it once. It wasn't easy to use but this one is. It was very easy to set up, the directions were clear and it's also easy to use while at the gym. Definitely a great buy.

title: Five Stars
body: Fast shipping product as described.

title: Great product
body: Got this as a B day present for my sister, she loved it, we were able to set it up in minutes and it works great. Thank you!

title: Seems OK
body: Expensive toy for my girlfriend, who hasn't even used it since I got it several months ago!Looks nice, powers on, appears to function.A bit pricey for what it does.

title: Amazing. Works Flawlessly.
body: Easy to use. Easy to maneuver through. Easy to get started. Love it and use it for my running, weightlifting, and hiking.Highly recommend.

title: Love it!
body: I use it every day and love it!

title: Item worked great
body: I always wanted a heart rate monitor that I can wear on my wrist and easily attach around my chest.  No issues with it.  Definitely what I expected.

title: I was disappointed with this heart monitor
body: I was disappointed with this heart monitor, especially considering how expensive it was.  My monitor never worked through an entire workout.

title: Came with weak battery
body: For some reason my watch was just bought and its battery I guess is weak. The problem is I live in Guatemala and there is not a way to change it.

title: Love it!
body: This has really helped me track my progress and I look forward to using it in new routines. So far so good.

title: Works as advertised
body: Was pleased with this monitor.  I like the different displays you can select.  The digits are bold and easy to read.

title: This has really helped me capitalize on my workouts and ...
body: This has really helped me capitalize on my workouts and really see what my exertion generates.  I wear my fitbit flex always and this goes on whenever I go for a run or head over to the gym to get a very accurate read of my performance.

title: Did not work
body: The device worked off and on.  It would stop counting for me in the middle of my workout randomly.  So I had to start it over.  The band also did not fit tight enough and would slide down when i would do classes that required a lot of jumping and running.  I would not recommend.  I followed the instructions carefully and when it worked it worked well.  I started having these issues in the first 2 weeks of having the product.  So I sent it back.

title: The Only Good HR Monitor
body: The most accurate heart rate devise out there! All these people moving to wrist readers are making a big mistake.  Nothing replaces the chest strap and I love the boost this gives me in a workout!

title: No that I specifically hated this product (because I bought the same thing locally)
body: No that I specifically hated this product (because I bought the same thing locally), but it just didn't work.  It was returned and all was well in a timely manor :)

title: I highly recommend this product
body: As the picky person that I am.. I highly recommend this product! Best thing I've spent my money on!

title: Five Stars
body: Does exactly what my husband wanted, check the heart rate calories and time while exercising

title: Four Stars
body: It was a gift.  By the sounds of it my sister likes it very much

title: Five Stars
body: Love love love this!!

title: Works great..
body: Works great...just wish it let you set goals & track your progress towards them. Got the wrong model! But, still a great product.

title: Five Stars
body: perfect for my spinning class, sync up with the Keiser spin bike at the gym.

title: Amazing
body: Love it. Use it twice and keeps me so motivated, easy to use and its fabulous! Sweating for wedding kick off!

title: Finally lost the weight I've been trying to lose with ...
body: Finally lost the weight I've been trying to lose with this baby! I know if I'm working hard enough when I can actually see my heart rate. Never gonna go without one of these again! Plus the watch is cute so I wear it even when I'm not working out.

title: Stops working
body: I have owned two of these watches and both stop working after a few weeks or month of use. The first one became defective within two weeks so I returned it. The one that replaced it seemed to have a longer shelf life but has since also stopped working. Everything has been replaced and I cannot figure out why this HRM just does not work. The second one stopped working after a month. I would not recommend this product or buy another one.

title: Perfect for my morning bootcamp workouts
body: Perfect for my morning bootcamp workouts! And the price was fantastic compared to some of the other heart rate monitors out there. Plus, I don't want to wear a monitor all day long like a fit bit, so this was a better option for me.

title: Polar Heart Monitors Are Defective
body: This is the 3rd Polar Heart Monitor that I have owned. On all of the monitors the transmitter quits working after 2 to 3 months. A change in batteries does no good. These products are clearly defective and should be taken off of the market.

title: Five Stars
body: I Love it! Works great. Thank you

title: Great, Basic Watch
body: I did some research and decided to purchase the FT4. I wanted something simple. It was really easy to use out of the package, very simple directions and set-up. The Chest strap is  adjustable and very comfortable. i forget it's there after a few minutes. It syncs with the cardio equipment at my gym so I don't always have to keep looking down at my watch. Overall, it's a little pricey for what it does, I'm sure you can find cheaper watches that do the same thing, but this is worth the extra money for the quality. I would recommend and I would buy again.

title: Works great. It doesn't look like I can replace the ...
body: Works great.  It doesn't look like I can replace the battery on my own however...hope that's not the case.

title: Good
body: I am really enjoying the watch! Good buy

title: The product was delivered in the day agreed.
body: Excellent product and the  color was as in the photo. Also the price was wonderful because I get monitor and band.

title: Awesome and Easy
body: I love this gadget because it is easy to use and works great! When I first got it in the mail, I was concerned that I would have a difficult time figuring it out, but not at all. It took about 30 seconds to figure out all of its functions after briefly looking at the directions. The machines at my gym are wireless and the device syncs with the machines, so my heart rate is right on the machine and I don't have to look at the watch. It beeps to tell you when you are over or under your heart range, which I absolutely love. I'm going to buy one for my mother-in-law. I think its an amazing tool regardless of fitness level or goals.

title: Love it
body: I love the product it help me when i do my trainnigs a lot! It's easy to use and pretty beautiful!

title: Great Monitor (Strap was too big for me though)
body: Love this monitor. The watch is made of a durable and comfortable material and the strap isn't too bad once you get used to it (and if it is the right size strap). The monitor is relatively easy to set up and use. I noticed that the value for calories burned recorded with this device is always a lot less (usually by half) than what the cardio machine (treadmill etc) says.. The heart rate (HR) measured is usually the same on both cardio machine and monitor watch. I guess this could mean that it is true that the machines overestimate calorie expenditure.. but I digress.The only issue I have with this monitor is the strap. It has always been too big (no, it wasn't stretched) even when it is on the smallest size and it slides down sometimes, which interrupts workouts (it interrupts calculation of calories burned and HR) and can be rather annoying.  Other than that I would recommend this product!

title: One Star
body: Not very efficient. Wish I could get my money back

title: LOVE IT, and use it all the time
body: LOVE IT, and use it all the time. Best thing to go along with my workouts. Its very easy to use feels good on and the strap fits great around my chest.

title: Great Watch
body: I recently upgraded to the Polar FT4 and I love the monitor!  The package came quickly, it was easy to setup and has worked perfectly since I got it several weeks ago.

title: Awesome!
body: Starting using it about 2 months ago to see how many calories I burned during a work out. I noticed that the Polar watch gave me a more accurate reading then the machines. The elyptical and treadmill both gave me MORE calorie than what I was really burning. Thanks to the watch, I can accurately measure my caloric intake/calories burned. This watch is definitely worth the money.

title: Five Stars
body: Great heart rate monitor! Very happy with ease of use, highly recommend

title: Piece of Junk
body: I have had the Polar FT4 for about 2 months. I use it for my aerobic training which consists of jogging a couple of  miles in the deep sand on the beach. The display of my heart rate is large, clear and accurate. The little 'Getting  Started' guide is pretty useless and you really need to download the complete manual. Otherwise you will miss out  on all the cool features like easily viewing time and then back to heart rate display as you are running etc.   The Polar FT 4 gives all the info you would want without being overly complicated.  UPDATE Since writing the above review the unit stopped working! Come on, you mean for $100 you can't get a  heart rate monitor that works for more than 2 months? I switching to Timex

title: Five Stars
body: I love it!!! It keeps me going to reach my daily goal.

title: Worst Customer Service warranty issues!
body: I would love this product - but it doesn't function properly. I sent the torn strap back once after two week's use (bad stitching at hook). Then replaced the battery in both the watch and the transmitter after one year usage and it will not read. The watch works, but there is no transmission of the reading HRM. Basically, contacted customer care with nothing but pat answers I can read in the instruction manual. After spending the $$ on this unit you better bet I stored and cared for it as instructed. I even ordered a new transmitter strap to troubleshoot. To no avail. Polar has the worst customer service ever!  Very disgruntled over this purchase. Other than that, when it did work - I liked it. Too bad.

title: Best purchase I've made!
body: I absolutely LOVE my HRM.  It's everything I wanted...from calories burned, to where I am in my target zones, to of course my heart rate.  I love that it also came w/ the chest strap, and that I didn't have to purchase that separately like some other HRMs.  It's easy to use, and very easy to read.  Once I programmed it, it was great!  And of course, it's easy to continue programming in everything as your weight changes, etc.I would definitely recommend this product!

title: Never worked. Just gave it as a gift after ...
body: Never worked.  Just gave it as a gift after having it in the original packaging for 60 days.  When turned on the watch says the transmitted isn't working.  Can't return it after 30 days.  Just sorry I gave it as a gift!

title: Five Stars
body: I swear by this with every work out!

title: Great watch, monitor stopped reporting.
body: The heart rate monitor band stopped working after a few months of use. Tried everything in the manual including changing the battery. Sending it in to polar since there's no service center near me.

title: Great watch
body: The watch is great. I had an older Polar heat rate watch that was meant for a man. This fits my wrist better and has all the functions I need!

title: Five Stars
body: Love my polar fit!

title: love it were it to the gym everyday
body: love it  were it to the gym everyday, it help me to know my heart rate and to slow down if it is to high and to stay in my range. :)

title: Easy to use
body: Easy to use, accurate heart rate monitor. You do have to wear the chest strap to display heart rate, otherwise it's just a watch. It feels bulky on your wrist and style is lacking.

title: Short Tempered People Beware
body: It's a mixed bag. We used these watches in my personal fitness class and I found them accurate, durable, and easy-to-use. HOWEVER. The watch I received for my birthday did not work from the start, and from that point I had a HORRIBLE customer service experience. I was hung up on, people didn't return my emails, live chat cut off, the person I ended up talking to was snippy, the list runs on and on. I received a new transmitter, which didn't work. I had to pay to ship the product back to them, and found that because I hadn't kept the receipt I would have to pay up to $75. So, the product is a good one, but heaven help you if you get a dud, because it will be a slow process.

title: exactly what I expected it to be.
body: Shipping was fast, and the item was exactly what I thought it would be. This product is great for people that workout and what to know exactly how many calories they are burning and their heart rate.

title: Yeah for Polar FT4  !!!
body: I was looking for something that could give me an idea on how hard I was working on my workouts and where I needed to improve...and I do recommend it to everyone who asks during my workouts!

title: Very easy to set up.
body: I've only had this monitor for a few weeks but I really like it.  It was very easy to set up.  The strap is very comfortable and I like that it keeps my training data.  I wet the strap before I workout and it starts to track my heart rate pretty quickly.  The large display is also easy on my "old eyes."

title: Five Stars
body: works great.
